Name: Unrealistic Expectations
Description: Pressure due to unachievable project completion time or quality standards.

Name: Tight Deadlines
Description: Stress caused by working under strict deadlines leading to an excessive workload.

Name: Unclear Requirements
Description: Anxiety due to ambiguous or ill-defined project requirements.

Name: Team Conflicts
Description: Stress and tension resulting from disagreements between team members.

Name: Work Overload
Description: Pressure caused by inadequate task distribution or lack of resources leading to an excessive workload.

Name: Lack of Recognition
Description: Dissatisfaction due to not acknowledging the efforts and accomplishments of team members.
